entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Haldimand County
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:57 PM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 6:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Dewpoint: -5.3°C
Wind: E 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
